title: Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender, Queer (LGBTQ) Alumni Chapter Scholarship Endowment Fund
description: To provide support for an annual scholarship to LGBTQ and allied students who maintain at least a 3.0 grade point average at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide support for an annual scholarship to LGBTQ and allied students who maintain at least a 3.0 grade point average at the University of Colorado Boulder.
